summary:
## Cannes Film Festival

The Cannes Film Festival is a big, annual movie event in Cannes, France. It shows new films from all over the world, including documentaries. Started in 1946, it's an exclusive festival, inviting only certain people. It's one of Europe's top three film festivals and one of the world's five biggest.

While famous for showcasing award-winning films, Cannes has also faced criticism for featuring controversial and shocking movies.  Some people also criticize it for not having enough diversity.
title: Cannes Film Festival
